ProjectTitle: INGENIOUS HETEROGENEOUS BEANS: unravelling variation during hydrothermal processing and digestion
InitialFeedbackHistory: 05/04/2023 Please note that LIRIAS is not suitable for data sharing, instead you can use a data repository to preserve your data underlying publications and to make it available for reuse, for example RDR (https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr) or a disciplinary repository, these also often have good guidelines on metadata standards, for more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing, you can also find a lot of useful guidance in the elixir RDMkit: https://rdmkit.elixir-europe.org/plant_sciences
label: good with suggestions
